title: WHAT IF: Why THANOS Chose [SPOILER] | T'Challa Star-Lord Episode BREAKDOWN
author: ScreenCrush
comment: Why do you think Thanos changed his mind?
Can we talk about how happy drax was his wife, and child were still alive.
Peter Quill isn't a bad guy, he's just damaged and trapped in his juvenile behaviors. If he gets rid of his childish tendencies, he gets rid of the only phase of his life that ever included his mom.
Who else really likes Nebula's redesign, and her potential romance with T'challa?
Thanos seemed to be happier in this timeline. Overall this entire story gave me that feel good vibe. Overall it had me in my feelings. Awesome episode!!
description:
What If brings us into the fare reaches of space...where T'Challa has somehow convinced Thanos to give up his quest for the infinity stones and snap away half of existence. In this video we talk about how T'Challa was able to persuade him to give up this quest. 

If you're new, Subscribe! →
